data.content: (Kỹ thuật) động não, thảo luận góp

noun
plural -storms
[count] US :an idea that someone thinks of suddenly - usually singular
Her latest brainstorm is to convert the garage into an apartment. - called also (chiefly Brit) brain wave
Brit :a temporary state of confusion :a period of unclear thinking
I'm sorryI must have been having a brainstorm when I wrote that.
verb
-storms; -stormed; -storming
to try to solve a problem by talking with other people :to discuss a problem and suggest solutions [no obj]
We need to brainstorm about this. [+ obj]
They had a meeting to brainstorm some ideas.
